text:
Billy Hurley
Billy Hurley was the younger brother of Ed Hurley and father of James Hurley.
Biography
At some point, Hurley married Susan and they had a son, James.
Hurley was employed at the Packard Sawmill until a stack of logs fell off of a truck and crushed one of his legs, forcing him to use a wheelchair and accept disability checks, which he spent in local bars.
When James was ten years old, Billy abandoned him and Susan.
